Name: Accessibilty to Cities
Desc_long: Global accessibility to high-density urban centres at a resolution of 1x1 kilometre for 2015, as measured by travel time.

Name: Travel Friction Surface
Desc_long: Friction surface used to map global accessibility to high-density urban centres at a resolution of 1x1 kilometre for 2015, as measured by travel time.

Name: Population Density
Desc_long: The Gridded Population of the World, Version 4 (GPWv4) consists of estimates of human population (number of persons per pixel) consistent with national censuses and population registers with respect to relative spatial distribution.

Name: Biofuels Development Potential Index
Desc_long: Biofuels expansion global land suitability maps, referred to as “development potential indices” (DPIs)Created through spatial multi-criteria decision analysis techniques that accounted for both resource potential and development feasibility.
